newsitem.title: INDONESIA: PRESS DIGEST - Indonesian newspapers - May 23.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Indonesian newspapers - May 23.

text.p: The following are the leading stories in the Indonesian press on May 23. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.

A CN-235 turbo prop aircraft built by Indonesia's Industri Pesawat Terbang Nusantara (IPTN) crashed in West Java while on a test flight killing all six crew on board, including an American instructor.
Major-General Sutiyoso, head of the Jakarta military region, has said security forces will not tolerate any more violence by people who wish to disturb the election.
Ousted leader of the Indonesian Democratic Party (PDI) Megawati Sukarnoputri has said she will not vote in next week's general election.
The Jakarta branch of the Moslem-oriented United Development Party (PPP) has called off plans for public gatherings on the final day of campaigning on Friday in the wake of recent violent clashes.
A man was was stabbed to death in a late night clash between supporters of the ruling Golkar party and United Development Party (PPP) on Wednesday.
